TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit ParameterBuilder extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.InteropServices._ParameterBuilder

span.span: Creates or associates parameter information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数属性需要与方法签名一致。Parameter attributes need to consistent with the method signature. 如果指定`Out`为参数的属性，应确保该方法参数的类型是`ByRef`类型。If you specify `Out` attributes for a parameter, you should ensure that the type of that method parameter is a `ByRef` type. 某些属性需要调用可行中的参数的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 的顺序在运行时正常工作。Some attributes require that you call with viable parameters in order for the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) to work correctly at runtime. 例如，如果你定义使用的参数 1 ParameterAttributes.Out `MethodBuilder`，然后参数 1 的必须是一个引用，如 Type.GetType ("System.String （& a)")，而不是 Type.GetType("System.String")。For example, if you define a with ParameterAttributes.Out for parameter 1 of a `MethodBuilder`, then parameter 1 of must be a reference such as Type.GetType("System.String&"), rather than Type.GetType("System.String"). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用引用使用传递的参数创建一个动态方法`ParameterBuilder`。The following example demonstrates how to create a dynamic method with a parameter passed by reference using `ParameterBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.ParameterBuilder Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetConstant (object defaultValue);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetConstant(object defaultValue) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub SetConstant (defaultValue As Object)
public: virtual void SetConstant(System::Object ^ defaultValue);

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 该参数的默认值。

span.span: The default value of this parameter.
Sets the default value of the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 限制为以下类型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. 如果参数类型是引用类型，需要 CLS 遵从性`defaultValue`要`null`。If the parameter type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 但是，从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`可以为非 null 的类型，只要该值可以分配给该引用类型的引用。However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for a reference type as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如，`Int32`值可以分配给类型的参数。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a parameter of type . 这不符合 CLS，但它可以是互操作方案中十分有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.

exception.span: 该参数不是受支持的类型之一。

span.span: The parameter is not one of the supported types.
-or-

exception.span: 的类型与该参数的类型不匹配。

span.span: The type of does not match the type of the parameter.
-or-

exception.span: 该参数的类型为 或其他引用类型，并且 不是 ，该值无法赋给引用类型。

span.span: The parameter is of type or other reference type, is not , and the value cannot be assigned to the reference type.
Sets a custom attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何设置格式，请参阅 ECMA 第 ii 部分文档，有关详细信息中的元数据规范`binaryAttribute`。See the metadata specification in the ECMA Partition II documentation for details on how to format `binaryAttribute`. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于访问托管类从非托管代码，不应从托管代码调用。This method is for access to managed classes from unmanaged code, and should not be called from managed code. 有关详细信息`IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`，请参阅 MSDN 库。For more information about `IDispatch::GetIDsOfNames`, see the MSDN Library.
